channel.title: Linux on Roger J. Bos Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Roger J. Bos Personal Website

item.title: Linux Notes
item.description: I am a big fan of linux. I enjoy ssh-ing into servers and using the command line, but since I don’t necessarily use linux every day, I sometimes forget some of the commands, so I keep this reference for myself. Linux Commands Users and Groups getent passwd shows a list of all the users on the server. sudo passwd <username> allows a sudoer to change the password of a user.
